website_summaries.verdict: Product seems to work well when combined with diet and exercise.
pros: Helps users not snack and choose smaller portions
Does not contain a stimulant, but helps increase energy
Doesn't seem to have side effects
cons: This product should not be used by pregnant or nursing mothers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I started my weight loss journey about a year ago and I was buying garcinia Cambodia from a big box store and if just wasn’t curbing my hunger. My weight loss had stalled and I saw your product and tried it. It is more pure and I am back on my journey and it does curb my appetite. I started at 180 a year ago and am at 140. Your product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I am within the first week of using this Garcinia, i am truly impressed with the results. They're easy to swallow and they really curb my appetite so that I don't crave as much of the junk food. I really like this product and looking forward to more results.
customer_reviews.author: B3HOME

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I feel great taking this product. I have been able to cut down on overeating the bad carbs. It makes me as well feel good about myself which is awesome. I truly recommend taking Garcinia Cambogia Extract for those who need that little help in losing weight
customer_reviews.author: Dimples

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR APPETITE SUPRESSING
customer_reviews.text: This is not a magic pill by any means. However, if you are like me and end up snacking throughout the day or have large helpings at each meal, Garcinia Cambogia is what you need. It helps curb your appetite so you eat smaller portions and feel no need to snack in between. Be patient as nothing is ever instantaneous when it comes to weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Norsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: First week I noticed I was less hungry after I took pills. Now at a month I did change my diet a little, and I ride a bike to work and work out at least half an hour every other day. I lost 8 lbs for now and didn't experience any negative side effects.I will continue to use this product for a few more months and hopefully see more weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: penina

customer_reviews.title: Loosing Weight
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different types of Garcinia Cambodia supplements, but honestly this one impressed me the most. Since I started to take it, I don’t hungry as before and I am loosing weight. I've also noticed 0 side effects which in comparable to others is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittyk

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Garcinia for a bit now. I didnt have much luck with supplements in the past because they've made me nauseous. This product does NOT do that. I love it! I can tell a difference in my energy level and my overall mood. Not to mention the fantastic customer service. I highly recommend it. It's a wonderful addition to diet and exercise!

customer_reviews.title: its pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: yeaa so far it works. just take the recommended dosage an you wont feel hungry. now it wont work right away on the first try but after 2-3 days you'll see the results in what you are expecting(when it comes to being hungry).

customer_reviews.title: Pair with good diet plan, guaranteed results!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lost 4lbs in the first two weeks. It helps cut down my snacking habits and gives me a lot of energy at the gym. Of course, you will have to pair with good diet and exercise. As the name suggests, it is a supplement to help your process. The hard work is on you
customer_reviews.author: Herriboo💞

customer_reviews.title: If Appetite Control is What You are Searching For......
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for appetite control and weight management. I take one capsule three times a day, and my appetite control, my weight is a manager, and I have more energy. I love this product because it works. I lost 271 pounds, and it is important to me that I maintain my weight loss. I had to lose weight for health reasons, and now my diabetes is gone. This product helps in immense ways. I have no bad aftertaste, no adverse side effects, and the capsules are easy to swallow. I love this product and will be taking it for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: A product that does what it says it will...
customer_reviews.text: With responsible eating and moderate exercise this really works. I've tried different weight-loss capsules to get my "middle-age spread" under control. This Prime Garcinia Cambogia has truly helped me in attaining my goal in terms of weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Rice75013

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I was 30 pounds overweight. Since starting the Garcina Cambogia, I have noticed a decline in my appetite. I have also lost 5 pounds! My goal is to lose all 30 pounds. I know that sounds like a lot, but GC is giving me an edge, I don't have any side effects. I am looking forward to great results.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Girard

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Garcinia Cambogia a couple months back after my husband told me to look into it. I was very skeptical, as I am with many supplements, however I was pleasantly surprised. I have never been overweight, but with the back to back births of my two children and the subsequent lack of time and energy, I have gained a few pounds. The Garcinia Cambogia helped me control my portions and gave me a boost of much needed energy to be more active through out the day. I have lost 7 lbs since I first started taking it. I can’t wait to see the results I get when I add in days at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Miller

customer_reviews.title: This Product works Great for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for a few DAYS now, and am absolutely in love with it. I have never used a dietary supplement before, and this product turned out to be amazing. In just a few days of using this product, I have noticed a huge shift in my appetite (I am honestly barely hungry all day long- something I never thought I would experience!) I have also noticed a boost in energy (when I work all day I normally just want to sleep, but now I have so much energy!) I cannot wait to continue using this product. I can’t wait to see my results!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for suppressing appetite
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but after researching about the ingredients, I decided to stop taking it. It was due to other medications I was taking. I was using it for about a month and it did control my appetite.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best brands I have used

I have more energy and have no side effects or changes in my mood using this brand. Very happy with and will continue to order Smartlife Nurtrition Garcinia Cambogia Prime. Thank you.

It’s says it should be taken while on a strict diet and working out so Ik that would better my results when I start working out.

I can't seem to lose any weight, but have recently found out that I have a thyroid issue. I started thyroid medication approximately a month ago. So maybe if I keep taking it I will see some results.

product_meta.title: Garcinia Cambogia Weight Loss Pills - 100% Natural 60% HCA Pure Extract Appetite Suppressant, Metabolism Booster, Non-Stimulant Diet Supplements for Men and Women - Vegan Non-GMO Gluten Free - 90 Cap
product_meta.description: Tired of working out hard and not seeing the results you hoped for? Are you looking for a supplement that supports an accelerated metabolism suppresses appetite and increases energy levels? SmartLife Nutrition Pure Garcinia Cambogia Extract can help! How does Garcinia work? First it suppresses your appetite by increasing serotonin levels. Low levels of serotonin are linked to depression and anxiety which drive many people to eat emotionally. Thus as your serotonin levels rise your mood improves and lessens the drive to reach for food during emotional situations. Second HCA stops the fat-making process in your body by inhibiting a key enzyme called citrate lyase. Most Well Balanced Effective Formula The daily dosage of Garcinia varies depending on your current weight and metabolism but it is always safe to go with the standard dose. The standard recommended dosage is 500-1500 mg of 60% HCA per day but this could vary a little. Does it really work? Obviously taking an HCA supplement alone won't help you shed pounds. But together with a healthy diet and regular exercise taking the recommended dose of Garcinia every day can help drastically in many forms and lead the way to an improved healthier and better lifestyle! feature_bullets: LOSE WEIGHT AND BOOST METABOLISM – When accompanied with healthy diet and exercise plan Garcinia cambogia extract often considered a miracle cure for obesity can help reduce waist circumference trim belly fat and lose body weight fast naturally without any stimulants. In addition Garcinia Cambogia also attacks fat already present providing a useful double whammy in reducing overall body fat stores helping those striving for a slim lean and fit figure.

SUPPRESS APPETITE AND CURB CRAVINGS – Overeating is a major problem which inevitably leads to weight gain but frequently has an underlying emotional aspect. Garcinia Cambogia helps suppress appetite by addressing neurochemical imbalances that tend to result in emotional eating. This can help especially with cravings for sugary foods which derail the best of weight loss plans

DIMISH DEPRESSION AND GAIN MOTIVATION – One of the major barriers to successful weight loss is your drive or lack thereof. Garcinia’s HCA content once again is said to be able to elevate serotonin levels and reduce cortisol leading to uplifted moods and sense of well-being. These effects are crucial for your journey to lose weight fast and get fit sooner.
